subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Micah Owings started in place of the injured Brandon Webb on the mound for visiting Arizona yesterday and went 4 for 4 with three doubles and three runs batted in as the Diamondbacks beat the Pittsburgh Pirates, 8-0, to stop a three-game losing streak.
